message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life. This is commonly known as depreciation.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see there is a line item specifically labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 127633.22 dated 2024-02-05.

Depreciation is indeed the systematic allocation of the cost of a tangible asset over its useful life, so this is the line item I'm looking for.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '127633.22'}}
```
